message: The DATA_SOURCE field for indicator 16-2-2, translated into all languages

data.en: Ministry of Interior (MINT), through the National Criminal Investigation Service (SERNIC) and General Command of the Police of the Republic of Mozambique (CGPRM)
data.pt: Ministério do Interior (MINT), através do Serviço Nacional de Investigação Criminal (SERNIC) e Comando Geral da Polícia da República de Moçambique (CGPRM)
